programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film) S1 (23/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film»Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parfum) S4 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Le parfum»Peppa and George are visiting Grampa and Granny Pig. Peppa is amazed by Granny Pig's perfume and gets an idea to make her own. She takes a glass of water and starts picking flowers around the garden. George is not impressed with the smell of it. He makes his own perfume that's very unique.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des enfants) S4 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des enfants»The school roof is leaking and Madame Gazelle is worried because they have no money to fix it. The children come up with the idea to organize a fete to raise money for the roof. All the grown-up are invited and every kid is in charge for something else, including the bric-a-brac store, face painting and the lucky dip.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (A Load of Litterbugs!) S5 (n°22)
programme.desc: «A Load of Litterbugs!»On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (16/21)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Fête ton anniversaire avec Blue !) S2 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Fête ton anniversaire avec Blue !»It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup»Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Lost Girl in a Canoe) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Lost Girl in a Canoe»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Coule ou flotte»Sink or Swim: The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes. (S1, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'éclosion surprise) S2 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'éclosion surprise»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S3 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa est bien trop bavarde, c'est du moins ce que pense Suzy. Peppa décide alors de ne plus jamais parler. Mais elle ne va pa pouvoir se tenir longtemps à cette résolution...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Surprise Box) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blue's Surprise Box»It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (François et le bébé Gorfou / Le Hippo rodéo de Danny) S4 (24/26)
programme.desc: «François et le bébé Gorfou / Le Hippo rodéo de Danny»Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Giant Plant) S3 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Giant Plant»Pups Save a Giant Plant: Mayor Goodway's gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when it's planted in the wrong place. It's time for a transplant!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Welcome Wagon) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Welcome Wagon»Welcome Wagon: When Baby's new neighbour doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind. (S1, ep 25b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (52/78)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (57/78)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Magic Trick: Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! (S1, ep 57).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (11/78)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»The Cuddle Toy: Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher loses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies! (S1, ep 11).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (12/78)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (13/78)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favourite circus show does not work. So the others create their own circus acts in the backyard instead. (S1, ep 14).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le spectacle de Noël de Monsieur Patate) S4 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le spectacle de Noël de Monsieur Patate»Mr Potato's Christmas Show: It's Christmas time! The Playgroup are going to see a special performance at the theatre. For some it is their first time in a theatre.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo?) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo?»Where Did It Go Barbabravo?: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Camion postier Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Camion postier Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (A la poursuite des tortues / La nouvelle machine à tondre) S4 (21/26)
programme.desc: «A la poursuite des tortues / La nouvelle machine à tondre»Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs./Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille Sauve Luke Stars / La Pat' Patrouille sauve Galinetta) S4 (23/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille Sauve Luke Stars / La Pat' Patrouille sauve Galinetta»Katie is going to perform her contest winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Catfish Capers) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Catfish Capers»Catfish Capers: Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan. (S1, ep 3a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film) S1 (23/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film»Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parfum) S4 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Le parfum»Peppa and George are visiting Grampa and Granny Pig. Peppa is amazed by Granny Pig's perfume and gets an idea to make her own. She takes a glass of water and starts picking flowers around the garden. George is not impressed with the smell of it. He makes his own perfume that's very unique.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des enfants) S4 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des enfants»The school roof is leaking and Madame Gazelle is worried because they have no money to fix it. The children come up with the idea to organize a fete to raise money for the roof. All the grown-up are invited and every kid is in charge for something else, including the bric-a-brac store, face painting and the lucky dip.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (A Load of Litterbugs!) S5 (n°22)
programme.desc: «A Load of Litterbugs!»On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (16/21)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Fête ton anniversaire avec Blue !) S2 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Fête ton anniversaire avec Blue !»It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup»Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Lost Girl in a Canoe) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Lost Girl in a Canoe»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Coule ou flotte»Sink or Swim: The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes. (S1, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'éclosion surprise) S2 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'éclosion surprise»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Stay Over) S1 (n°59)
programme.desc: «The Stay Over»When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything to get him to stop, without disturbing his nap.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (20/21)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Dora l'exploratrice (Dora's Royal Rescue) S7 (17/19)
programme.desc: «Dora's Royal Rescue»Dora and Boots and the noble horse, Rocinante, are off to Story Castle to rescue Don Quixote from the evil wizard, Malambruno.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Baddy Long Legs) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Baddy Long Legs»The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure»Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington pizzaiolo) S2 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington pizzaiolo»Paddington the Pizza Chef: Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around! (S2, ep 11b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La danse des algues / Dans sa bulle) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «La danse des algues / Dans sa bulle»When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William vs. Wild) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «William vs. Wild»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (15/78)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (16/78)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (17/78)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»A Very Busy Afternoon: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, (S1, ep 17).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (18/78)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie") S4 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie"»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bosse de maman Rabbit) S4 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La bosse de maman Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aquarium) S4 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'aquarium»The Aquarium: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium. With all the different fish surely Peppa can find a new friend for Goldie?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La voiture de course de George) S4 (32/52)
programme.desc: «La voiture de course de George»It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»The Little Boat: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Clock and dance) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Clock and dance»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Camion postier Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Camion postier Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les jeux du flocon) S7 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Les jeux du flocon»It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Monsieur Hellinger retombe en enfance / La piñata) S4 (25/26)
programme.desc: «Monsieur Hellinger retombe en enfance / La piñata»Tracker dreams that the water from a golden coconut turns Mayor Humdinger into a baby. It's Alex's birthday and has made a piñata for the party, but Mayor Humdigner steals the piñata.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'ours somnambule / Danny le pro du rodéo) S4 (9/26)
programme.desc: «L'ours somnambule / Danny le pro du rodéo»The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!
